You can reach me at lrlessa[at]domaindotcom

About

I've been working with web development since 2013, I have a degree in Internet Systems at the Federal Institute of Education, Science and Technology of Rio Grande do Sul (IFSUL) and I'm currently working as a Frontend Tech Lead at HOX.rs.

I'm a frontend developer with a diverse skill set. I'm comfortable tackling projects that require solid business logic and a focus on creating functional products. On the flip side, I also enjoy taking on more artistic and niche projects that have a shorter lifespan.

I've been involved in end-to-end project work, which means I handle everything from collaborating with clients to define the business rules, selecting the right technologies, and actually developing the solutions. I also have a passion for knowledge sharing and enjoy providing feedback and guidance to my peers.

To wrap it up, my true joy lies in building things alongside people I resonate with and enjoy working with, within a partnership-driven and collaborative environment, always prioritizing the project's outcome.
